verses.roman:
chaya vatsara aiche prabhu karilā vilāsa
kabhu iti-uti, kabhu kṣetra-vāsa

synonyms: chaya vatsara—six years; aiche—in that way; prabhu—the Lord; karilā—did; vilāsa—pastimes; kabhu—sometimes; iti-uti—here and there; kabhu—sometimes; kṣetra-vāsa—residing at Jagannātha Purī.
translation: The Lord traveled all over India for six years. He was sometimes here and sometimes there performing His transcendental pastimes, and sometimes He remained at Jagannātha Purī.
